row.process: ! --------------------------------------------- :SET &RENTENVERAENDERUNG# = 'J' :SET &LOGA# = 'J' :SET &BEA_BESCHREIBUNG# = 'BBSEreignisRente_Loga_Bearb' :SET &PROGRAMMTYP# = '487' :SET &PROGRAM# = '&PROG_LC#' :SET &INIFILE# = '&PROGRAM#.ini' :SET &OPTIONS# = '&INIFILE#' :SET &LOGFILE# = '&LOGDIR#/&BEA_BESCHREIBUNG#.log' :SET &OUTFILE# = '&WORKDIR#/&PROGRAM#_&TS#.out' :SET &EXTOUTFILE1# = '&LOGDIR#/&BEA_BESCHREIBUNG#.csv' :SET &INPUTFILE# = '&WORKDIR#/nb42p800_&TS#.out' ! --------------------------------------------- :INC JOBI.BS20_EXPORT_LOGDIR ! --------------------------------------------- cat << __EOF__ |tee &RUNDIR#/&INIFILE# TRACE = &TRACE# PROT_VTR_FILTER = &PROT_VTR_FILTER_BEA# PROT_MSG_TYPE = &PROT_MSG_TYPE_BEA# BESCHREIBUNG = &BEA_BESCHREIBUNG# BEARBEITER = &PROGRAMMTYP# LOGFILE = &LOGFILE# OUTFILE = &OUTFILE# EXTOUTFILE1 = &EXTOUTFILE1# INPUTFILE = &INPUTFILE# [BEARBEITER] RENTENVERAENDERUNG = &RENTENVERAENDERUNG# LOGA = &LOGA# __EOF__ ! --------------------------------------------- !starten Anwendung :INC JOBI.STANDARDJOB ! ---------------------------------------------
